params.name: window_length
params.description: The length of the window in samples.

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the window function.

params.name: periodic
params.description: Whether the window is periodic or symmetric.

params.name: frame_length
params.description: The length of the analysis frames in samples. Provide a value for frame_length if the window is smallerthan the frame length, so that it will be zero-padded.

params.name: center
params.description: Whether to center the window inside the FFT buffer. Only used when frame_length is provided.
